answers.answer: 194 is under the recommended guideline of 200 for a total cholesterol score, but to know if your numbers are truly healthy, it would help to know your break down by LDL, HDL and Triglycerides. If you can provide that we can give you better input.Jon

question: I am a 29 yr old female on a no sugar diet to help prevent diabetes which is high in my family. I just got a 194 total cholesterol level reading while fasting...
title: 29 yr old female with 194 cholesterol fasting
